data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Viroviticko-Podravska.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Viroviticko-Podravska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 307 believers in the state of Viroviticko-Podravska the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Over 7.68 percent of the people of Viroviticko-Podravska are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, help the church in the state of Viroviticko-Podravska do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bosniak people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Viroviticko-Podravska, Croatia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Viroviticko-Podravska, Croatia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Viroviticko-Podravska, Croatia has a population of 72,900.

We estimate Viroviticko-Podravska has 307 people who might know Jesus, 66,992 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,601 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 237 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Viroviticko-Podravska. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.
